sg.edu.nus.cs2103t.omnitask.ui

Class Ui

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.cs2103t.omnitask.ui.Ui
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaFxUi, StubUi

    public abstract class Ui
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all user interaction and rendering of task lists.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Ui.ControllerCallback
      This interface is used by Ui class to communicate with Controller class in the form of callback methods

    • Method Detail

      • closeHelp

        public abstract void closeHelp()
        Closes the help window.

      • closeMiniHelp

        public void closeMiniHelp()
        Closes the mini help window.

      • exit

        public abstract void exit()
        Exits the UI. Should be called before exiting the program to allow clean ups.

      • invokeShowMiniHelpIfAvailable

        public void invokeShowMiniHelpIfAvailable(java.lang.String userInput)
        Helper method to call Ui.ControllerCallback.showMiniHelpIfAvailable(java.lang.String). Calling this ensure that the method is not called on a null controllerCallback.
        Parameters:
        userInput - User's input

      • invokeShowAll

        public void invokeShowAll()
        Helper method to call Ui.ControllerCallback.showAll(). Calling this ensure that the method is not called on a null controllerCallback.

      • invokeMarkTaskAsDone

        public boolean invokeMarkTaskAsDone(long id)
        Helper method to call Ui.ControllerCallback.markTaskAsDone(long). Calling this ensure that the method is not called on a null controllerCallback.
        Parameters:
        id - Task id
        Returns:
        true If command is successful

      • invokeMarkTaskAsNotDone

        public boolean invokeMarkTaskAsNotDone(long id)
        Helper method to call Ui.ControllerCallback.markTaskAsNotDone(long). Calling this ensure that the method is not called on a null controllerCallback.
        Parameters:
        id - Task id
        Returns:
        true If command is successful

      • redraw

        public void redraw()
        Redraws WebView. Use when graphical glitch in JavaFx's WebView occur.

      • scrollDown

        public void scrollDown()
        Scroll the task list down.

      • scrollUp

        public void scrollUp()
        Scroll the task list up.

      • showSection

        public void showSection(java.lang.String section)
        Scroll to specified section. However, usually you would call showSection(DateTime) or showSection(DateTime, DateTime) instead.
        Parameters:
        section - Section to scroll to

      • showSection

        public void showSection(org.joda.time.DateTime endDate)
        Scroll to specified date.
        Parameters:
        endDate - Date to scroll to

      • showSection

        public void showSection(org.joda.time.DateTime startDate,
                        org.joda.time.DateTime endDate)
        Scroll to specified date.
        Parameters:
        startDate - Date to scroll to
        endDate - Date to scroll to

      • setControllerCallback

        public void setControllerCallback(Ui.ControllerCallback controllerCallback)
        Sets the controller callback.
        Parameters:
        controllerCallback - Usually the controller class this Ui is associated with

        public abstract void showAllTasks()
        Show all tasks.

        Show error message to user.
        Parameters:

      • showHelp

        public abstract void showHelp(java.lang.String msg)
        Show help window.
        Parameters:
        msg - Body for help window.

      • showMessage

        public abstract void showMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Show message to user.

      • showMiniHelp

        public void showMiniHelp(java.lang.String msg)

        Parameters:

      • showAlternateList

        public abstract void showAlternateList(MainViewController.ViewMode viewMode,
                                       java.lang.String title,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks)
        Show alternate task list. Used to switch between search mode (& category mode) and archive mode.
        Parameters:
        viewMode - ViewMode to set to. See MainViewController.ViewMode.
        title - Title to show on the text field at the top.
        tasks - Tasks to populate the list with.

      • start

        public abstract void start()
        Start the Ui lifecycle.
